useCase.name: Search Content
useCase.description: As a User Agent, I want to search for content in the database through the API.

preconditions.precondition: The User Agent has the necessary permissions to access the API.

successEndConditions.condition: The API returns a successful search result in a structured format.

failureEndConditions.condition: The API returns an error or no search results are found.

useCase.trigger: The User Agent sends a search request through the API containing a single string to search for in the database.

mainSequence.step: User Agent sends a search request to the API.
API searches content in the database based on the query.
API returns the search results to the User Agent.
User Agent receives the search results in a structured format.
